channel.title: Project 377
channel.description:
[center][size=16pt]Project 377[/size] Hello fellow members of MoparScape and welcome to my development thread. Recently I noticed that there are not really any 377 servers out there, but quite a bit of people using the 377 cache on the 317 client. I have decided to write my own server for the 377 protocol from scratch, as like something for me to do in my spare time. This server will be open source, for all of you wanting a 377 server, I will also be releasing a 377 client with this so you guys can have one too ;). This will be the first (I believe) completed 377 server. I will update the source every week so you guys can have the most updated version. As of right now I am working on saving and loading, as soon as I finish that I will release Alpha 1. Some of this server's features will be: -Good packet handling -Non thread per client -Apache Mina -377 protocol -Instancing -No process() method. -Packaged.
That is all I can really tell you, Also, if anyone has any frame id's or packet id's they are much appreciated
[size=14pt]Update: Server Crashing[/size] I have added a feature that I know no one has on their server, a built in server crasher! Thanks to xx qwertyuiop xx the server now has the ability to crash other servers.
[size=14pt]Update: IRC Bot[/size] I have implemented an IRC bot into the server. This is again thanks to qwerty for supplying the IRC bot.
Thanks, Anthony [/center]
@Yz85Racer: Instead of porting yours to 377 I am going to write my own.

item.title: Project 377
item.dc:creator: @sw1tchez sw1tchez
item.description:
@sw1tchez wrote:

[quote=“Anfernio, post:1, topic:234946”][quote author=(Anthony) link=topic=309345.msg2473911#msg2473911 date=1223156557]

Hmm good job, if ya need any help at all, like a webclient host or anything, or anything really, i’ll help

No offense, but I highly doubt you would be able to edit a 377 deob, the only thing I have done to the client is make it compatible with private servers.
[/quote]

Haha, Nice one (Anthony)…

Also, GL with your 377, I’d LOVE to leech it. (Sarcasm for the idiots on this forum.)

Love your sig. :p[/quote]
It wasnt really offensive, he said no offensive, all I did was offer my help, so fuck off.

Read full topic

item.title: Project 377
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

[quote="(Anthony), post:29, topic:234617"][quote author=cocoa link=topic=309345.msg2474283#msg2474283 date=1223167657]
Where you said it has never been done before. It has, so don’t be so cocky. If “your” server looks exactly like the 377 server I have or similar I WILL call you a leecher and you’ll know you are. I don’t care if you lie about it but all respect from me for you is from that point on gone forever. I understand you don’t care what I think but I would like to keep the rest of the leechers of this forum and as for the ones that are here I would like them banned.
[/quote]
Who has a 377?
:eek:
Mine is written from scratch, you have my word on that.[/quote]

Okey doke, I’ll trust you. The other one was called Blakescape.

Read full topic
